name: Labradorite Ring handmade sterling silver recycled 14K gold size 8
description:
labradorite Ring.
Sterling silver recycled 14k gold.
size 8
A smooth square cushion cut labradorite (12X12mm), with generous blue green flash is set in a hand crafted fine silver bezel onto a backing of sterling silver. Each side of the setting features a hand shaped 'curl' of sterling silver, each adorned with a button of recycled solid 14K gold.
The band is an 8g sterling silver comfort band soldered onto the back of the setting.
Overall measurements of the setting are 21mm X 13mm, band is 3mm wide.

A rustic, industrial one of a kind handmade ring to adorn your finger.

The setting is slightly hammered textured, and oxidized to enhance the raw, industrial look.

Ready to ship in a size 8.

name: Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign
description:
Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign
Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign
zoom
Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign Forest green seraphinite necklace Handmade sterling silver art jewelry by Raredesign
A gorgeous, forest green seraphinite is the focus for this necklace. A freeform seraphinite cabochon (21mm x 20mm) with beautiful dark green color and veining of white with a pearlescent luster is bezel set in fine silver onto a sterling silver backing. Above and below the focal stone are arcs of hammered twisted sterling silver wires. Below the focal stone, three 6mm smooth seraphinite coins on hand wrapped ball end sterling silver headpins hand freely moving. The pendant hangs freely moving and removable on a delicate 18 inch sterling silver box chain on a figure eight of handwrapped sterling silver wire, with another 6mm smooth round seraphinite coin.

The pendant hangs about 2 1/2 inches below the chain (measured to the longest dangle).

The necklace was oxidized to a dark patina for a rustic, earthy look.

name: Cobalt blue druzy abstract ring sterling silver and brass
description:
An abstract, freeform, mixed metal blue druzy ring that centers around a triangle of glittery cobalt blue. This ring makes me think of a starry night sky, the focal is a cobalt, royal blue druzy triangle (@23mm) with a beautiful crystalline surface.
The druzy is set in fine silver onto a sterling silver backing which is shaped to form an arc over one side of the triangle. The setting is decorated with sterling silver wire, hand made fine silver balls (each @3-4mm), corrugated sterling wire and yellow brass wire framing the bottom and side of the triangle.
The setting measures @25 X 27mm at its widest point.
The band, which is soldered onto the backing is a wide (@7mm) hammered sterling silver band.

The ring was oxidized and polished for a rustic, industrial look.
Ready to ship in a size 7 1/2 (really is a 7 3/4 but because of the width, will fit like a 7.5)

name: Golden druzy sterling silver recycled 14K gold necklace
description:
A rustic, industrial piece that mixes sparkle with rough and sepia tones. A golden moonbeam druzy ( 20mm X 16mm)) is bezel set with fine silver onto a sterling silver pendant backing with a hammered texture. The setting is enhanced with two 4mm white mother of pearl cabochons set in sterling silver, an arc of fine silver and a touch of solid 14K gold to match the gold of the druzy.
The pendant is a slider style, freely moving and removable on an 18' sterling silver snake chain.
Overall dimensions of the pendant are 27mm X 32mm.
The finish is oxidized to enhance the rustic, antiqued look.

name: raspberry pink druzy ring handmade sterling silver jewelry size 6 and a half
description:

Raspberry pink druzy ring handmade sterling silver metalwork jewelry size 6 and a half

From RareDesign
Raspberry pink druzy ring handmade sterling silver metalwork jewelry size 6 and a half
zoom
Raspberry pink druzy ring handmade sterling silver metalwork jewelry size 6 and a half Raspberry pink druzy ring handmade sterling silver metalwork jewelry size 6 and a half Raspberry pink druzy ring handmade sterling silver metalwork jewelry size 6 and a half Raspberry pink druzy ring handmade sterling silver metalwork jewelry size 6 and a half
A luscious pink druzy ring featuring a raspberry pink druzy quartz oval (@26mm X 20mm) which is set into a handmade fine silver bezel soldered onto a sterling silver backing. The band is a sterling silver half round band soldered onto the back of the setting for a very comfortable fit. A big, statement ring, but surprisingly lightweight.

The druzy itself is a pretty, mauve pink with a beautiful crystalline center, and a little surprise! The crevice in the stone goes all the way through so at certain angles you get a flash of bright silver, like a mirror reflecting the stone from inside (seen best in pic3).

The finish is bright and polished and a little bit rough to match the rough stone. Could be oxidized upon request for a more rustic look.

Ready to ship in a size 6.5
